title: Hillary Just Used Trump’s Own Words To Fact-Check His Debate
text:
Now Reading
Hillary Just Used Trump’s Own Words To Fact-Check His Debate
Read Next
1.Trump mocked former Miss Universe Alicia Machado’s weight and heritage, calling her names like “Miss Housekeeping” and “Miss Piggy.”
 Howard Stern: “Are you for invading Iraq?“
 Donald Trump: “Yeah, I guess so. You know, I wish the first time it was done correctly.”
5. In the 1970s, Trump’s real estate company was sued by the Department of Justice for discriminating against minority applicants in both New York and Virginia–in New York, their applications were marked “C” for colored.
See Also
18. On whether the housing market would crash:
Donald Trump: “I sort of hope that happens because then people like me would go in and buy.”
Trump: “Now we should go in, we should stop this guy, which would be very easy and very quick. We could do it surgically, stop him from doing it, and save these lives. This is absolutely nuts. We don’t want to get involved and you’re gonna end up with something like you’ve never seen before.”
Don’t let Trump fire Special Prosecutor Mueller
Special Prosecutor Mueller has found enough evidence to bring charge in his investigation of the Trump campaign’s alleged collusion with Russia, but President Trump has openly talked of firing Mueller before he can bring justice. Don’t let him! Demand Congress pass a law preventing Trump from firing Mueller before it’s too late.
Thank you for making your voice heard!

quotes: You know, I wish the first time it was done correctly.
I sort of hope that happens because then people like me would go in and buy.
Now we should go in, we should stop this guy, which would be very easy and very quick.
We could do it surgically, stop him from doing it, and save these lives.
We don’t want to get involved and you’re gonna end up with something like you’ve never seen before.
